title: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases         Despite bitter cold, hundreds of people came to Chalmette Battlefield on January 8, 2015, for a ceremony commemorating the 200th anniversary of the Battle of New Orleans.   Follow the links below for information about  park management public involvement an NPS report on economic benefits to communities, states, and the nation based on 2014 spending and visitation. You can read the summary in a press release or the full report. hurricanes and their effects on the park, from Hurricane Katrina in 2005 to the present BioBlitz at the Barataria Preserve in May 2013 the Call to Action Report 2012 for Jean Lafitte and for New Orleans Jazz National Historical Park. If you wish to download the report, please note that it is a 984kb document. You can learn more about the National Park Service Call to Action here.  finding the lost hiker at the Barataria Preserve in May 2011  the Deepwater Horizon oil spill in 2010   For information about events and programs, visit the park's calendar. Information about park sites, hours and days of operation, maps, etc., is at the Plan Your Visit page.
